name: devCLI
description: A CLI for running and managing projects

nextjs-npm.name: Next.js (NPM)
nextjs-npm.description: Initialize a Next.js project using NPM and standard Next.js template.

python-fastapi.name: Python (FastAPI)
python-fastapi.description: Initialize a Python project with FastAPI.
python-fastapi.initCommand:
python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install fastapi uvicorn && touch main.py && echo 'from fastapi import FastAPI

app = FastAPI()

@app.get("/")
async def root():
    return {"message": "Hello World"}' > main.py

simple-python-cli.name: Python (Simple CLI)
simple-python-cli.description: Initialize a basic Python script with a virtual environment.
simple-python-cli.initCommand: python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && touch main.py && echo 'print("Hello from basic Python script!")' > main.py
simple-python-cli.dockerStartupCommand: docker build -t simple-python-cli-app . && docker run --rm simple-python-cli-app
